pages.title: Account
pages.text: Open an account to enable more features.

pages.title: Account advantage
pages.text: With an account you can find your favorites, your history and resume playback on another device.

pages.title: Resume playback
pages.text: When reopening a content previously watched, playback resumes where you left off.

pages.title: Resume playback
pages.text: When reopening a content previously watched, playback resumes where you left off.

pages.title: Account
pages.text: With an account you can find your history and resume playback on another device.

pages.title: Receive notifications
pages.text: You will be notified when a new episode is available.

pages.title: Receive notifications

pages.title: Account
pages.text: With an account you can find your favorites and be notified on another device.

pages.title: Watch later
pages.text: Bookmark a content to comsume it later.
